Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Associate editor, Computational Statistics and Data Analysis
Associate editor, Advances in Data Analysis and Classification
Associate editor, Statistical Methods and Applications

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Organisation of 3 scientific meetings at UCL and University of Hamburg
Invited speaker at more than 20 international conferences and workshops (incl. ISI 2013 Hong Kong, ISI 2015 Rio de Janeiro, International Conferences on Robust Statistics)
Organisation of 10-20 Invited Sessions at international conferences (including IFCS, ERCIM, Model-based Clustering and Classification)
About 10 participations in Local and Scientific Programme Committees of conferences (mostly IFCS and German Classification Society)
Key note speaker, Frankfurter Stochastik Tage (German Open Conference on Statistics and Probability)
Invited plenary speaker, IFCS 2006 Conference Data Science and Classification, Ljubljana, Slovenia
Key note speaker, Annual Conference of the German Classification Society GfKl, Freiburg
Invited Speaker in President's Invited Session, Conference of the International Federation of Classification Societies 2013, Tilburg, The Netherlands
Organiser of the AG DANK/BCS Meeting on Variable Selection and Dimension Reduction in Clustering and Classification, London
Key note speaker, Annual Meeting of the Portuguese Classification Society JOCLAD, Lisbon
Key note speaker at Royal Statistical Society Merseyside Meeting on Supervised Classification, Liverpool
Invited discussant, Joint Statistical Meetings, Boston, USA
Key note speaker, 25 Years VOC (Dutch/Flemish Classification Society) Jubilee Meeting, Rolduc, Belgium
Key note speaker, AFEKA Conference on Speech Processing and Unsupervised Machine Learning Seminar, Tel Aviv, Israel
Invited tutorial and presentation, COMPSTAT, Oviedo, Spain
Key note speaker, Conference on Model-Based Clustering and Classification, Catania, Italy

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Modelling customer purchase data for Ecommera Retail Strategy, London
Consultancy for Adam&EveDDB Business communication, London
Consultancy for Public Health Unit, Camden and Islington Council, London

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: Annual participation in lecture series for UCL PhD students "Statistics for Researchers" (UCL Doctoral School), "Interdisciplinary Studies of Evidence" and "Environmental Statistics Training for NERC Doctoral Training Partnership"

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Treasurer of the British Classification Society
Chair of the Working Group on Data Analysis and Numerical Classification of the GfKl (German Classification Society)
Secretary and Executive Committee Member of International Federation of Classification Societies
Member of the Advisory Board of the GfKl (German Classification Society)

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Principal Investigator on EPSRC Grant EP/K033972/1, A multicriterion approach for cluster validation
